definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

pinyin: he2 shi4 lu4 yin1 ci2 dai4

sentences.english: Listen to the tape and find out the main idea of this article and how it is organized.
sentences.chinese: 通過聽錄音磁帶，來幫助學生對文章的結構有所瞭解。

sentences.english: The foreign guest picked some music tapes with our help. He was pleased and thanked us a lot.
sentences.chinese: 在我們的幫助下這位外國友人挑了一些音樂磁帶。

sentences.english: Extreme formant shifting is like 1/2 speed tape , but realtime.
sentences.chinese: 偏激的共振峯偏移像半速運行的磁帶，但是實時的。

sentences.english: Now let's enjoy the tape of a fiwimous popular singer Miss Tianzhen.
sentences.chinese: 目下當今欣賞一下在大歌星田震的磁帶。

sentences.english: Usually the tape drive is reserved for the exclusive use of that application.
sentences.chinese: 通常磁帶設備是由一個應用程序獨佔使用的。

sentences.english: The message came unusually on two tapes, just before we came to Kauai.
sentences.chinese: 信息要錄在兩盒磁帶上，正好在我們回到考艾島之前。

sentences.english: A new cassette recorder recorded their love swear.
sentences.chinese: 一臺嶄新的盒式磁帶錄音機記錄下他們愛的誓言。

sentences.english: She was listening to her cassette tape when she suddenly saw a man standing on the side of the road.
sentences.chinese: 她正聽着卡式錄音磁帶，突然看見一個男人站在路邊。

sentences.english: It works like a tape, except that there are no moving spools .
sentences.chinese: 這一工作原理就像磁帶，只是沒有轉動軸。

sentences.english: An ordinary video camera can be confiscated and its tape destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 一架普通的攝相機可能被沒收或磁帶被銷燬。

sentences.english: She recorded audio tapes of books for blind people.
sentences.chinese: 她爲盲人把書的內容錄成錄音磁帶。

sentences.english: I'll run the whole tape through again. Please listen to it carefully.
sentences.chinese: 我把這盤磁帶從頭至尾再放一遍，請仔細聽。

sentences.english: I sent in a tape and got the job.
sentences.chinese: 我寄出了一盤磁帶，得到了這份工作。

sentences.english: Tape the backboard pattern together to make the full pattern.
sentences.chinese: 磁帶的籃板模式共同努力，使全模式。

sentences.english: It would be uneconomical to send a brand new tape .
sentences.chinese: 寄一盤新磁帶過去不合算。

sentences.english: If I hoffer got enough money yesterday. I would haudio-videoe hoffer thlocated on tape.
sentences.chinese: 要是我昨天錢夠的話，我就買了那盒磁帶了。

definition: opening titles (of movie)/leader (blank film at the beginning and end of a reel)
